Description: Here's a 2015 Gibson Custom Shop Flying V Standard in a factory original Ice Tea Sunburst finish. This guitar is in beautiful condition fand has been well cared for. The finish is glossy and clean with only a few nearly microscopic marks on the front near the knobs, the back is close to perfect- see pics. The tuners and the electronics are all original. It has a rosewood fingerboard with a really nicely flamed maple top. Here's the link for more details - These originally retailed for around $5799 https://www.gibson.com/Products/Electric-Guitars/2016/Custom/Flying-V-Standard.aspx Please look at all 50+ pictures- they accurately represent the very nice condition of this instrument. It weighs 7.4 lbs and has a medium 50's neck. Comes with the Gibson hardshell case and Certificate of Authenticity as seen in the pictures. This guitar will be safely packed and shipped. Buyer to pay $60 FedEx shipping anywhere in the U.S. Full insurance included in shipping. California residents please add 7.25% sales tax. Local San Diego pickup always welcome. Will ship worldwide. International shipping guidelines: Buyer is responsible for any import duties. We can declare a low value. FedEx Ground to Canada is $175 with full insurance. FedEx or USPS Express is $245 to most parts of Europe and the UK. FedEx is $295 to Asia and Australia. Full insurance available. Please call or email me if you have any questions - 858-531-2287
